Name: State Historical and Cultural Park "Ancient Merv"
Description: State Historical and Cultural Park Ancient Merv" - UNESCO World Heritage Site. One of the oldest and best-preserved oasis cities along the Silk Road."

Name: Silk Roads: Zarafshan-Karakum Corridor
Description: Silk Roads: Zarafshan-Karakum Corridor - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Part of the extensive Silk Roads network in Central Asia.

Name: Cold Winter Deserts of Turan
Description: Cold Winter Deserts of Turan - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Unique desert ecosystem with exceptional biodiversity.
